singleBoatData.title: Ferry Tempo Single Boat Data
singleBoatData.description: Data schema for any given boat from the Ferry Tempo API

ArrivalTimeMinus.description: Seconds until arrival at destination port.

ArrivedDock.description: Time of boat arrival at dock.

ArrivingTerminalAbbrev.description: WSF Vessel API pass-through: The abbreviated terminal name that represent's the vessel's next destination. Might not be present if the next scheduled destination is still being determined.

ArrivingTerminalName.description: WSF Vessel API pass-through: The name of the terminal that represents the vessel's next destination. Might not be present if the next scheduled destination is still being determined.

AtDock.description: WSF Vessel API pass-through: Indicates whether or not the vessel is docked

DepartingTerminalAbbrev.description: WSF Vessel API pass-through: The abbreviated terminal name where this vessel is docked or was last docked

DepartingTerminalName.description: WSF Vessel API pass-through: The name of the terminal where this vessel is docked or was last docked

DepartureDelayAverage.description: A particular boat's average delay in seconds for the day.

Direction.description: Conveys travel towards one port or the other.

EstimatedArrivalTime.description: WSF Vessel API pass-through: The estimated date and time that the vessel will arrive at its destination. This value is not present when docked.

Heading.description: WSF Vessel API pass-through: The heading of the vessel (in degrees).

InService.description: WSF Vessel API pass-through: Indicates whether or not the vessel is in service.

LeftDock.description: WSF Vessel API pass-through: The date and time that the vessel last left the dock. This value is not present when docked.

OnDuty.description: Conveys if a boat is truly in service.

ScheduledDeparture.description: WSF Vessel API pass-through: The date and time when this vessel was or is scheduled to leave its departing terminal. Might not be present if the next scheduled destination is still being determined.

Speed.description: WSF Vessel API pass-through: The speed of the vessel (in Knots).

VesselName.description: WSF Vessel API pass-through: The name of the vessel.

VesselPosition.description: Although WSF provides 'VesselPositionNum', it may switch between boats throughout the day. Therefore, it may make sense to assign our own via the unique vessel IDs, say whichever is a lower value.

VesselPositionNum.description: WSF Vessel API pass-through: For a given route, the number used to identify the scheduled departures being serviced by this vessel. Not present if vessel is not in service.

singlePortData.title: Ferry Tempo Single Port Data
singlePortData.description: Data schema for any given port from the Ferry Tempo API

BoatAtDock.description: Indicates if an in-service vessel is in port.

PortArrivalTimeMinus.description: Seconds until arrival of next inbound boat.

PortDepartureDelay.description: Seconds delayed beyond scheduled departure of latest vessel.

PortDepartureDelayAverage.description: Average delay in seconds of boats departing port.

PortEstimatedArrivalTime.description: Date + time of next inbound boat.

PortSheduleList.description: List of scheduled departures for the day.

PortStopTimer.description: Seconds in port since last boat arrival.

TerminalAbbrev.description: WSF Vessel API pass-through: The abbreviated terminal name where this vessel is docked or was last docked.

TerminalName.description: WSF Vessel API pass-through: The name of the terminal where this vessel is docked or was last docked.

description: Data schema for any given route from the Ferry Tempo API

boatData.title: Ferry Tempo Route Boat(s) Data
boatData.description: An object representing all boats for a given route.

portData.title: Ferry Tempo Route Ports Data
portData.description: An object representing the ports for a given route.

lastUpdate.description: Date/time in epoch seconds of the last Ferry Tempo data update.

title: Ferry Tempo Data
